text: Acha abb Allah tumhara bojh halka kerta hai woh khoob janta hai kay tum mein na tawani hai pus agar tum mein say aik so sabar kerney walay hongay to woh do so per ghalib rahen gay aur agar tum mein aik hazar hongay to woh Allah kay hukum say do hazar per ghalib rahen gay Allah sabar kerney walon kay sath hai
